snippet.title: Disney's Herbie: Rescue Rally (NDS Gameplay)
snippet.description: In Herbie: Rescue Rally, everyone's favorite Bug returns! This time the racing is more exciting than ever. Herbie comes to the rescue of an animal sanctuary that may become a toxic chemical factory run by the E. Vile Corporation. Race to victory on extreme race courses full of ramps, hills, and tunnels while competing against Herbie's toughest opponent: evil Herman.
